Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: ~rhegde - You need to vendor any external dependencies with your chaincode. You can use govendor to accomplish this

Action.author: muralisr
Action.body: ~rhegde vendoring should have worked. Will try and update.

Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: ~muralisr Vendoring is not working actually. Something very odd here.

Action.author: greg.haskins
Action.body: Vendoring should technically no longer be necessary if you use the CLI to package the deployment (SDKs still haven't caught up). IIUC there is some kind of bug in the auto-vendoring logic (CR 6991)

Action.author: muralisr
Action.body: ~greg.haskins is that because the CLI env will pick up the external dependency and vendor automatically into the install package ?

Action.author: greg.haskins
Action.body: ~muralisr it's supposed to (as of CR 6991) but this was a bug in that CR.
